name: Mr. Mohammad Tassi
title: RVC CTTC
bio: Is a holder of Master's degree in Engineering Management, and Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering. He has also completed many international formal professional training/ education programs in his field.

name: Mr. Maged Foaud Hashem
title: RVC GAC
bio: Graduated in 1983 from the faculty of Engineering in Alexandria University, Power Engineering, and has been a professional HVAC engineer since then.

name: Mr. Mohamed Ibrahim
title: RVC MP
bio: Mohamed Ibrahim is Control and instrumentation Director in Dc pro engineering Has 20 years' experience in the control & Automation Most in District cooling plant in Addition to various industry such as water & Waste water, cement, paper plant , Food & beverage , For last ten years been as designer & system analysts for HVAC & district cooling process.

name: Mr. Aakash Patel
title: RVC RP
bio: Aakash Patel is an Engineer graduated from University of Mumbai in 2004. He completed his Post Graduation in Business Management from T A Pai Management Institute, Manipal in 2008.

name: Mr. Michel Hayek
title: RVC SA
bio: Michel Hayek is currently a professor in the Department of Mechanical Engineering and is serving as the Dean of the Faculty of Engineering at Notre Dame University-Louaize, Lebanon, since October 2012.

name: Mr. Muhammad Omer Khan
title: RVC YEA
bio: Muhammad Omer Khan is a Mechanical Engineer from the NED University of Engineering and Technology, Karachi, graduating in 2012. He is currently working as a Planning Manager at Shan Associates and works in the design and implementation of HVAC systems.

name: Mr. Bassel Anbari
title: Committee Chair
bio: Graduated from Tennessee Technological University USA in 1984 with Bachelor of Science in Mechanical Engineering.

name: Mr. Arvind Surange
title: Refrigeration Chair
bio: Has Master's Degree In AC&Ref from University Of Roorkee (Now IIT) In 1963 & Advanced Training In Germany & Denmark.
